div.style: border:0px; [IF MeCreator]border-right-width:9px; border-right-style:solid; border-right-color:[mycolor] ; [ENDIF MeCreator]border-top-width:3px; border-top-style:solid; border-top-color:[IFNOT headSet][bgresumecolor][ENDIF headSet][IF headSet][evglobalstate][ENDIF headSet]; background-color:[bgresumecolor]; height:100%; color:[textcolor]; text-transform:lowercase;
